outcome_brief.statement: Frontpage quests are easy to understand, pages load reliably, and release steps are clear.

major_update.name: Major Update: Frontpage Quest Board Stability and Release
major_update.description: Ship simple, clear quests with stable data loading and a documented release path.
major_update.outcome_statement: Frontpage quests are easy to understand, pages load reliably, and release steps are clear.

quest_chains.name: Frontpage: Stabilize Core
quest_chains.description: Make quest data stable and easy to use.

steps.title: Document Quest and Boss API examples
steps.description: Add one clear docs page with example request and response payloads.
steps.goal: Anyone can read one doc page and understand how Quest and Boss data looks.
player_steps: Create or update one docs file for Quest and Boss API examples.
Add example request and response for list and detail endpoints.
Add one short section called Common Errors with expected error response examples.
done_when: Docs page includes examples for quest list/detail and boss list/detail.
Examples are valid JSON and easy to copy.
PR includes link to the updated docs page.

steps.title: Speed up Quest and Boss list loading
steps.description: Add caching for list endpoints so pages load faster and fail less often.
steps.goal: Quest and Boss list pages load quickly and show stable results.
player_steps: Add caching for quest list and boss list API handlers.
Show a clear fallback message when upstream data is unavailable.
Add tests for cache hit, cache miss, and fallback response behavior.
done_when: List endpoints return data successfully with cache enabled.
Fallback response is user-friendly and consistent.
Test output in PR shows cache and fallback tests passing.

steps.title: Fix Quest Board filter reset bug
steps.description: When class changes, difficulty filter should reset to avoid empty broken states.
steps.goal: Users can change filters without losing valid results.
player_steps: Update filter state logic so difficulty resets when class changes.
Add regression tests for class and difficulty combinations.
Improve empty-state text so users know what to do next.
done_when: Changing class does not leave stale difficulty state.
Regression tests pass for filter reset behavior.
Quest list remains usable during filter changes.
proof_required: Short screen recording of filter behavior

quest_chains.name: Frontpage: Ship Release
quest_chains.description: Polish quest pages and make release steps repeatable.

steps.title: Improve Quest and Boss card readability
steps.description: Make cards easier to scan on desktop and mobile.
steps.goal: Players can read goal, due date, rank, and proof quickly.
player_steps: Update card layout to show key fields near the top.
Add clear lock text for rank-gated quests.
Fix spacing and text wrapping for small screens.
done_when: Card layout is readable at common mobile and desktop widths.
Locked quests show clear Requires <Rank> text.

steps.title: Generate release notes from completed quests
steps.description: Add automation that drafts release notes from closed quest issues.
steps.goal: Release notes can be generated automatically with less manual work.
player_steps: Add or update a workflow/script to collect closed quest issues.
Group notes by chain and difficulty.
Write output to a markdown file artifact or release draft body.
done_when: Running the workflow/script produces release note content.
Output includes issue links and grouped sections.
PR includes one sample generated output.
proof_required: Workflow run link or terminal output

steps.title: Add rollback runbook and helper command
steps.description: Create a rollback guide and one repeatable command script.
steps.goal: Team can follow written rollback steps without guessing.
player_steps: Add a rollback runbook document with clear step-by-step instructions.
Add a helper script or command block for the most common rollback path.
Include a short verification checklist after rollback.
done_when: Rollback runbook exists and is linked from release docs.
Helper command executes locally in a safe dry-run mode.
PR includes command output and docs screenshot.

bosses.name: The Drift Hydra
bosses.description: Quest and Boss pages break trust when data is inconsistent or hard to read.
bosses.rollback_plan: Temporarily disable advanced quest features and show stable fallback content until fixes are live.
kill_criteria: Quest and Boss pages load without critical errors for 48 hours
No P1 or P2 regressions are open at release go/no-go
hp_tasks: HP1: Quest and Boss API examples documented
HP2: List endpoints use stable caching
HP3: Filter reset bug fixed and tested
HP5: Release notes automation produces output
HP6: Rollback runbook and helper command published
proof_required: PR links for all HP tasks
